Synopsis: When a young man realizes that his inheritance depends upon his getting married, he tries to pull a fast one by wedding a life-size doll. Little does the scheming bachelor know that the incredibly lifelike toy is, in fact, the daughter of the man who created it, adopting the clever disguise to secure a spouse of her own. Ernst Lubitsch's romantic fantasy stars Victor Janson, Ossi Oswalda. The German film features color tinting and an original score. 64 min. Standard; Soundtrack: music score. Silent with music score.
